resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106565</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206472</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lincoln's Spot Resolutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Punkt-Zerlegungen Lincolns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résolutions de la Tache de Lincoln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definições Do Ponto De Lincoln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risoluzioni Del Punto De Lincoln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ψηφίσματα σημείων του Λίνκολν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resoluciones Del Punto De Lincoln</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides background information and lessons (correlated to academic standards) that incorporate the use of textbooks, maps, and discussions based on primary documents such as the U.S. Constitution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt die Hintergrundinformationen und Lektionen 
zur Verfügung (aufeinander bezogen mit akademischen Standards) die 
den Gebrauch von Lehrbüchern, Karten und den Diskussionen, die auf 
Primärdokumenten wie der VEREINIGTE STAATEN Beschaffenheit basieren 
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit l'information de fond et les leçons 
(corrélées avec des normes d'universitaire) qui incorporent 
l'utilisation des manuels, des cartes, et des discussions basées sur 
les documents primaires tels que la constitution des ETATS-UNIS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece a informação e as lições de fundo 
(correlacionadas aos padrões academic) que incorporam o uso dos 
textbooks, dos mapas, e das discussões baseadas em originais 
preliminares tais como o constitution de ESTADOS UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le informazioni di base e le lezioni 
(correlate agli standard accademici) che comprendono l'uso dei 
manuali, dei programmi e delle discussioni basate sui documenti 
primari quale la costituzione degli STATI UNITI.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις βασικές πληροφορίες και τα μαθήματα (που 
συσχετίζονται στα ακαδημαϊκά πρότυπα) που ενσωματώνουν τη χρήση 
των εγχειριδίων, των χαρτών, και των συζητήσεων βασισμένων στα 
αρχικά έγγραφα όπως το ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ σύνταγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a la información y a las lecciones de
fondo (correlacionadas a los estándares académicos) que incorporan 
el uso de libros de textos, de correspondencias, y de discusiones 
basadas en documentos primarios tales como la constitución de ESTADOS
UNIDOS.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206472</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106565</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/lincolns-spot-resolutions</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
